49832.summary: Some customers in Bruderheim are experiencing an interruption to Internet, Television and Home Phone services. We are working to restore service as quickly as possible and apologize for any inconvenience this may cause.
49832.title: May 24 - Bruderheim | All Services - Outage (Fix In Progress)
